column2: In the past 30 days, how often did you visit a convenience store, small market, or liquor store?
In the past 30 days, when you visited convenience stores, small markets, or liquor stores, how often did you see ads for e-cigarettes?
column10: ASK: Respondents who have visited a store or market.

column2: In the past 30 days, when you visited convenience stores, small markets, or liquor stores, how often did you see ads for tobacco products?
column10: ASK: Ask respondents who have visited a store or market.

column2: The next questions are about things you may have seen inside or outside shops or stores where people can buy tobacco products. In the past 30 days, have you seen cigarette or other tobacco packages being displayed, including on  shelves or on the counter?
Since you quit using tobacco, has there been a time when seeing a tobacco product display or other signs that tobacco is sold there, has given you an urge to buy tobacco?
column10: ASK: Former tobacco users who are not experimental current users of tobacco
